content:
path /v3/algorand/transaction/txid
operationId AlgorandGetTransaction
parameters
description Transaction id
in path
name txid
required True
schema
type string
summary Get Algorand Transaction
description 1 credit per API callGet Algorand transaction by transaction id
responses
200
AlgoTx
type object
properties
closeRewards
description rewards applied to closeremainderto account
type number
closingAmount
description closing amount for transaction
type number
confirmedRound
description Round when the transaction was confirmed
type number
fee
description Transaction fee
type number
firstValid
description First valid round for this transaction
type number
genesisHash
description Hash of genesis block
type string
genesisId
description genesis block ID
type string
id
description transaction ID
type string
intraRoundOffset
description Offset into the round where this transaction was confirmed
type number
lastValid
description Last valid round for this transaction
type number
note
description Free form data
type string
paymentTransaction
description payment Transaction
type object
receiverRewards
description rewards applied to receiver account
type number
roundTime
description Time when the block this transaction is in was confirmed
type number
sender
description Senders address
type string
senderRewards
description rewards applied to sender account
type number
signature
description signature
type object
txType
description indicates what type of transaction this is Different types have differnet fields
type string
description OK
